page.title: 07 PAPER MANUFACTURER
page.content:
Papyrus is a cardboard manufacturer at Newton Kyme. It produces only white card, often in carton form, in different shapes and sizes to sell to mostly food and drink companies. They make cartons for chocolate manufacturers and frozen food. For the Royal Wedding they made a special box for Bell's Whisky.
About 180 people work for them. The men work two days then have three days off. The first two days of work are twelve hour day shifts. Then the last two days are twelve hour night shifts. Papyrus provide their own houses for the workers to live in. At the factory they do not dye the boxes but sell them straight to the buyer. In the laboratory they test the card to see if the card is the right variety for the buyer.
